content:
Overnight oats are a great way to start the day.

I'm glad you asked about podcasts! There are so many fantastic shows out there that can make your commute more enjoyable and informative. Here are some popular morning podcasts that are around 20-30 minutes long:

**1. The Daily** (20-30 minutes)
From The New York Times, this daily news podcast covers current events, politics, and more.

**2. How I Built This** (20-30 minutes)
Guy Raz interviews entrepreneurs and innovators, sharing their stories and insights on building successful companies.

**3. The Tim Ferriss Show** (20-40 minutes)
Tim Ferriss digs deep into the habits, routines, and strategies of successful people from various fields.

**4. The School of Greatness with Lewis Howes** (20-30 minutes)
Lewis Howes shares inspiring stories and practical tips on lifestyle design, entrepreneurship, and personal growth.

**5. Happier with Gretchen Rubin** (20-30 minutes)
Gretchen Rubin and her sister Elizabeth Craft offer practical advice on how to live a happier, more fulfilling life.

**6. The 5 AM Miracle Podcast** (20-30 minutes)
Hal Elrod shares productivity tips, goal-achieving strategies, and inspiring stories to help you start your day on a high note.

**7. The Mindful Kind** (20-30 minutes)
Rachael Kable shares mindfulness techniques, self-care tips, and inspiring stories to help you cultivate a more mindful lifestyle.

**8. The Daily Boost** (9-20 minutes)
Scott Smith offers daily motivational messages and inspiring stories to help you boost your productivity and positivity.

**9. The GaryVee Audio Experience** (20-40 minutes)
Gary Vaynerchuk shares his insights on marketing, business, and personal growth, with a focus on taking action and making progress.

**10. The TED Radio Hour** (20-40 minutes)
Based on the popular TED Talks, this podcast explores a wide range of topics, from science and technology to art and design.

These podcasts are all engaging, informative, and concise, making them perfect for your daily commute. You can find them on popular podcast platforms like Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Google Podcasts.

Enjoy your morning commute and happy listening!
